body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     People     Slavery at Monocacy                 Slavery at Monocacy          Although African-American slaves were instrumental in the development of the Monocacy area, they often appear only incidentally in the historic record. While specific details about enslaved individuals at Monocacy are rare, a great deal of information has been uncovered about the institution of slavery in Maryland.
